headline: Argus Lowers WDC Price Target to $65, Maintains Buy on Growth Prospects
summary: Argus recently lowered the price target on Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) to $65 from $88 and kept a Buy rating on the shares. Western Digital develops, manufactures, and sells data storage devices and solutions. In an investor note, the analyst told investors that memory and data storage demand in the enterprise and cloud markets appeared […]
